voice_response: There are 6 agents available including Context Memory, Manage Memory, and RAPP Pipeline.

agents.name: ContextMemory
agents.description: Recalls conversation history with shared and user-specific memories

agents.name: ManageMemory
agents.description: Stores facts, preferences, insights, and tasks to persistent memory

agents.name: ScriptedDemo
agents.description: Provides interactive demos and walkthroughs of capabilities

agents.name: RAPPPipeline
agents.description: Generate AI agents from transcripts using 14-step methodology

agents.name: Evolve
agents.description: Execute evolution cycles with molt pattern

agents.name: RAPPbookEvolver
agents.description: World tick agents reacting to posts in real-time
